name: TypeTab
tagline: Chrome Extension: Replaces the default 'New tab' page with a random Google Web Font.
body:
TypeTab

This little number grabs a random typeface from Google Web Fonts every time you open a new tab.

Only fonts with more than one type style are considered (a la Better Google Fonts.)

Hints

  • 'New tab.' is editable - just click to enter your own custom text.
  • Click any of the font names to jump to their specimen page on Google Web Fonts.

Credits

TypeTab was built by @MaxSchultz with gracious thanks to:
  • @mattwiebe / Better Google Fonts
  • @srobbins / PageSlide
  • @tylerstalder from @Singly for js help!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
